title: Joe Biden: Covid vaccination in US will not be mandatory
description: It comes as the Centers for Disease Control urges "universal mask use" anywhere outside the home.

description: Wales "could not suppress" Covid after its firebreak lockdown, the health minister says.

description: The UK warns chances of a breakthrough are "receding", as it negotiates with the EU over business rules.

title: Dune and Matrix 4 streaming plan prompts urgent talks from AMC cinemas
description: Odeon owner AMC is alarmed by Warner Bros' plan to stream films in US as soon as they hit cinemas.

description: The US space agency has awarded two American and one Japanese firm contracts to pick up lunar soil.

title: Primark predicts rising sales despite Covid hit
description: The chain says recent lockdowns cost it £430m in sales, but trading since reopening has been strong.
